tweets.text: @SianieRoo @jksmith34 @microlabdoc @MPGeorgeEustice @BorisJohnson @EnvAgency Just to emphasise, we have been reporting incidences of #AirPollution by landfill gases to @EnvAgencyMids & @NewsNBC. Over 6000 complaints logged by us to the EA in March alone!

tweets.text: @jksmith34 @microlabdoc 1/2Thank you v v much for your interest.The environment minister for England @MPGeorgeEustice has been made aware as well as the prime minister @BorisJohnson They have instructed @EnvAgency to sort this mess out. Sadly the EA have made a number of questionable decisions

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy
@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @robbiedyson @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StaffordshireCC @NewsNBC @RedIndustries2 I'm sure I can guess.....Nothing whatsoever. Gutless EA.

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Thank you Chris & Chris for taking a stand on this. A potentially brilliant project marred by ludicrous timing and even more ludicrous proposals for finding and "protecting" nests that are (irony claxon) already protected - by law.
@SimonTagg Belfast City Council can do this, but we can’t ? I’m sure there are various complexities, but if they can find a way to #stopthestink so can we.... https://t.co/EtpVj8tH4p

@ClareDinnisEA @robbiedyson @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StaffordshireCC @NewsNBC What punishment are you going to hand out to @RedIndustries2 for failing to adhere to the enforcement notice on time?

Please listen now @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @kiergroup This COULD be a fantastic project but you need to do the work at the correct time of year and NOT during the breeding season. Thanks @ChrisGPackham for the support and fingers crossed they see sense. https://t.co/En5Y1I6Rts

It is. It is astonishing. But it is and @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice know it. So does @StaffordshireCC @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids Thank You @DJAndyMoor for your support and voice @StinkStopthe https://t.co/cikerfAUTU

Educating responders @WestMidsFire @WMFS_OLPD about our duty to help protect the environment 🌳 🌸 🐁 from #hazmats and other materials. Equipment provided by @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency but deployed by the fire service. https://t.co/T6tXQbY8Fz

I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K
This is utter bloody madness, and stupidity...think again please @EnvAgency !!!! https://t.co/ei86VsKLEE

Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va
